issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Hi Team,

As per the new Apple Guidelines from Apple we need to build the app with IOS 14 SDK included in Xcode 12. We are currently using Appcelerator 6.0.0 and below is the system config:

macOS Mojave
version 10.14.6

Can you please confirm if the current Studio version is supported with Catalina 10.15?

Also we are not able find the .dmg file for downloading the Studio after the upgrade. Can you please provide me the download link for the same.

Regards,
Ashish S
fields.summary: Is it possible to run appcelerator Studio with macOS Catalina 10.15

comments.body:
Studio will work on catalina, it will not work on big sur (TISTUD-9224).

Given the EoL announcement downloads of Studio have been removed and the product is no longer downloadable. Please use either the [Atom|https://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Atom_Package] or [VS Code|https://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Visual_Studio_Code_Extension_for_Titanium] extensions or the CLI to perform builds
